/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the overall vibrancy of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
